reviewText:
I have not watched this in several years. From what I remember, it is not as good as the regular Bible Songs we used to own. It was ok though. What I really like is Kids Sing Praise Volume 1, a show we owned a long time ago. It has really great music and songs. Sadly, I think it might be out of print though. I really hope Kids Sing Praise is not out of print. I highly encourage this for young Christian kids.

My favorite show is Little House on the Prairie. That is a show I recommend. That is one a lot of Christians enjoy watching. My favorite book is Farmer Boy Goes West. Even the name of the title sounded very interesting to me!
It was ok, not as good as the bible songs dvd that we already have.
Enjoy the music.  Songs you can sing all day long.  No one does it like Cedarmont.  Good clear music and enjoyment.
